Function to get unfiltered intercell resources For each resource and OmniPath variant compiles tables of ligands, receptors and interactions

Source: R/get_omnipath.R
compile_ligrec.Rd

Function to get unfiltered intercell resources For each resource and OmniPath variant compiles tables of ligands, receptors and interactions

compile_ligrec(lr_pipeline = TRUE)

Arguments

lr_pipeline

bool whether to format for lr_pipeline and remove

duplicate LRs (mainly from composite OmniDB due to category (adhesion vs lr))
omni_variants

bool whether to get different OmniPath variants (e.g. _full, based on ligrec resource quality quartile, or if only lig_rec)

Value

A list of OmniPath resources formatted according to the method pipes

Details

calls on omnipath_intercell, intercell_connections, get_partners, and intercell_connections

Contents

Developed by Daniel Dimitrov, Charlotte Boys, Martin Garrido Rodríguez, Denes Turei, James Nagai.
